=== Basic Desktop Tasks ===
==== Changing the Screen Resolution ====
 1. Go to System > Preferences > Screen Resolution
   <nowiki>[[File:screenres.png]]</nowiki>
 2. Choose the "Resolution" from the list.
  2. If the desired resolution is not available, run <pre>
dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg
</pre> as root, and follow the instructions, and choose the appropriate resolutions at the appropriate section.
   <nowiki>[[File:xserver-reconfig.png]]</nowiki>
